doc.title: Husk
doc.plot: Lucy, a young woman with a pet snake, lives with Freddie, her father, in a desolate part of the country. Her dad leaves the house earlier than usual one day, heading for the his usual stool at a local bar. The landlord, Hugo, shows up at the house, looking for Freddie. Lucy is hardly dressed, and soon Hugo is assaulting her in lieu of the rent. But perhaps, this is Lucy's plan all along. And the wages of sin?
